mapper.sql: uuid, con_id, pod_id, name, image, resources, process_id, work_dir, node_name, env, args, volumes, mounts, exposed_ports, ports, entrypoint, cmd, domain_name, hostname, ip_address, status, exit_code, error, con_detail, created_time, dns
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from container
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT t6.uuid FROM application t1, instance t2, deployment t3, replicaset t4, pod t5, container t6 WHERE t1.uuid = #{application} AND t1.uuid = t2.application_id AND t2.uuid = t3.instance_id AND t3.uuid = t4.deployment_id AND t4.uuid = t5.set_id AND t5.uuid = t6.pod_id AND t6.con_id IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: insert into container (uuid, con_id, pod_id, name, image, resources, process_id, work_dir, node_name, env, args, volumes, mounts, exposed_ports, ports, entrypoint, cmd, domain_name, hostname, ip_address, status, exit_code, error, con_detail, created_time, dns) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{podId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resources,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workDir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{env,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{args,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volumes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mounts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exposedPorts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ports,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entrypoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domainName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{error,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dns,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
